nodes.text: Chibias was a Mid Rim world near Sibisime.
In 4 ABY, Chibias was governed by Imperial Governor Egron.

Following the Battle of Endor, Egron tried to enrich by selling the control codes of a Star Destroyer to Markko, the leader of the local Rebel cell. Their plan failed because they didn't manage to decrypt the codes. They tried to force the young slicer Ghent to help them but he was rescued by Emperor's Hand Mara Jade. Ironically, she was just come to Chibias to attend a symphonic concert. Governor Egron was killed by Mara Jade for his treason against the Empire.
